get.description: Search news articles by query with an option to limit the results to a specific time range.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for which to get news.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of news articles to return. Default: 500 Allowed values: 1-500

parameters.name: time_published
parameters.description: Find news articles published in a specific time range. Default: anytime

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Domain of the source from which to return news articles. Example: cnn.com

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code. See all available country codes. Default: US

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see ISO 639-1 alpha-2. Default: en

get.description: Get the full story coverage, including all sub articles, top news, and posts from X (formerly Twitter).

parameters.name: story
parameters.description: The Story ID for which to get full coverage. Story IDs are returned for news articles with sub_articles from any of the endpoint returning news articles. In addition, Story IDs can be obtained from a News Story URL as it appears after the stories/ path part (e.g. /stories/CAAqNggKIjBDQklTSGpvSmMzUnZjbmt0TXpZd1NoRUtEd2pzbFA3X0N4RjlDUlpVVnhudXBpZ0FQAQ) after navigating to an article's Full Coverage.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return articles (i.e. all_articles list) in a specific sort order. Default: RELEVANCE Allowed values: RELEVANCE, DATE

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code. See all available country codes. Default: US

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see ISO 639-1 alpha-2. Default: en

get.description: Get news article in a specific section of a topic (World,  Sports, Technology, etc) or publication (CNN, BBC, etc).

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topic or publication for which to get news headlines. Available topics: WORLD NATIONAL BUSINESS TECHNOLOGY ENTERTAINMENT SPORTS SCIENCE HEALTH In addition, topic / publication IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the topics/ or publications/ path part (e.g. Football Topic - /topics/CAAqJQgKIh9DQkFTRVFvSUwyMHZNREoyZURRU0JXVnVMVWRDS0FBUAE)

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Example value: CAQiSkNCQVNNUW9JTDIwdk1EZGpNWFlTQldWdUxVZENHZ0pKVENJT0NBUWFDZ29JTDIwdk1ETnliSFFxQ2hJSUwyMHZNRE55YkhRb0FBKi4IACoqCAoiJENCQVNGUW9JTDIwdk1EZGpNWFlTQldWdUxVZENHZ0pKVENnQVABUAE

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of news articles to return. Default: 500 Allowed values: 1-500

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code. See all available country codes. Default: US

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see ISO 639-1 alpha-2. Default: en

get.description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic (World,  Sports, Technology, etc) or publication (e.g. CNN, BBC, etc).

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topic or publication for which to get news headlines. Available topics: WORLD NATIONAL BUSINESS TECHNOLOGY ENTERTAINMENT SPORTS SCIENCE HEALTH In addition, topic / publication IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the topics/ or publications/ path part (e.g. Football Topic - /topics/CAAqJQgKIh9DQkFTRVFvSUwyMHZNREoyZURRU0JXVnVMVWRDS0FBUAE)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of news articles to return. Default: 500 Allowed values: 1-500

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code. See all available country codes. Default: US

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see ISO 639-1 alpha-2. Default: en

get.description: Get the latest news headlines/top stories for a country.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of news articles to return. Default: 500 Allowed values: 1-500

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code. See all available country codes. Default: US

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see ISO 639-1 alpha-2. Default: en

get.description: Get valid languages for a country code, to be used with all other APIs.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code of the country to get languages for. See all available country codes.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Area, city or country to fetch news for (e.g. London).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code. See all available country codes. Default: US

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see ISO 639-1 alpha-2. Default: en

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of news articles to return. Default: 500 Allowed values: 1-500
